invocations.description: Puts the script into auto-mode for interval milliseconds. A script that is in auto-mode will execute itself every certain interval of time. If the command is executed in a hotkey, that hotkey, when pressed, will enable the repetitive execution and disable it if pressed again. If 0 is passed for interval and the hotkey is currently running on auto, the hotkey is taken off auto-mode.
invocations.exDescription: It will cast 'light healing' spell each 2.5 seconds.

invocations.description: Puts the script into auto-mode for a random interval between intervalfrom and intervalto milliseconds.
invocations.exDescription: It will try to eat a food each 200~500 milliseconds.
